asymmetric_local_search.result: NO improvements found - baseline is at true local optimum

tessellation_angle_pairs.result: ALL angle pairs produce scores 1.8x to 6x WORSE than baseline

conclusion: The baseline uses a sophisticated configuration that cannot be improved by: 1) Small perturbations (asymmetric local search), 2) Different tessellation angles. After 24 experiments, ALL approaches converge to ~70.627.
